[time1].title: Welcome to MyNotes!
[time1].content:
Here you will be able to create your notes and lists, an example of which can be found here.

We wish you productive work! :)

[time1].title: Archived notes will appear here
[time1].content:
The contents of an archived note.

To move a note to the trash or restore it to the main folder, click on the appropriate icon.

[time1].title: Deleted notes will appear here
[time1].content:
The contents of the deleted note.

To delete a note permanently, click on the eraser icon. And to restore it to the root folder, click on the house.

question.content: You don't have an account yet?

errors.auth/email-already-in-use: Podany adres e-mail jest już używany!
